name: risk_free_rate
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool risk_free_rate_api.
Tool description: Returns the risk-free rate for a given date. Geography and proxy (duration) are customizable. Treasury Bonds and Bills are used as source.
API description: This endpoint returns the risk free rate for a specific date. Default values are:

date = yesterday
geography = US
duration = 3m

Currently only US is supported. Durations supported are 3m, 5y and 10y. Historical values are supported until 1960-01-04.

duration.description: Duration for which the risk-free rate is to be fetched. Supported values are '3m' (default), '5y', and '10y'.

geography.description: Geography for which the risk-free rate is to be fetched. Currently, only 'US' is supported. Default is 'US'.

date.description: Specific date for which the risk-free rate is to be fetched in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Default is '2023-05-10'.
